::Hot Rod::

He reopened a comm to Galvatron.
"Well I'm at the Maximal base. There is a standoff between the Maximals
and the Alliance. We were ready to end this battle but some hot heads on
both sides are still trying to kill each other. All hell is going to
break out any time now. If you would like to come be my guest. It's been
a long time."

::DrillBit::

He opened a comm to Starscream.
"Ok, some of DarkFate's troops are building a new entrance. They will
contact you, if they havn't already."(They already did.)
